input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to thoroughly clean your computer?
input_text.Response A:
Sure! Here are some steps you can take to clean your computer:

- Turn off your computer and unplug all of the cables.
- Use a can of compressed air to blow out any dust that may be inside the computer.
- Use a soft cloth to wipe down the outside of the computer.
- Use a small brush to clean the keyboard.
- Use a cotton swab to clean the crevices.
- Use a vacuum cleaner to clean the inside of the computer.
- Use a special cleaning solution to clean the monitor.
- Use a dry cloth to wipe down the monitor.
- Turn on the computer and test it to make sure it is working properly.
input_text.Response B:
Sure, here is a basic introduction to programming with VBScript:

VBScript is a simple, yet powerful scripting language that can be used to create a wide variety of programs, from simple scripts to complex applications. It is a subset of the Visual Basic programming language, and is designed to be easy to learn and use.

To begin programming with VBScript, you will need to create a new script file. This can be done by opening a text editor, such as Notepad, and saving the file with a .vbs extension. Once you have created your script file, you can begin adding code to it.

The basic syntax of VBScript is similar to that of other programming languages, with variables, functions, and loops. You can also use conditional statements, such as if-then-else and switch, to control the flow of your program.

To interact with the user, you can use the InputBox function to display a dialog box and collect user input. You can also use the MsgBox function to display a message box to the user.

To access and manipulate files and directories, you can use the FileSystemObject (FSO) object. This object provides a wide range of methods and properties that can be used to read and write files, create and delete directories, and more.

To access and manipulate databases, you can use the ADO (ActiveX Data Objects) object. This object provides a wide range of methods and properties that can be used to connect to and query databases, as well as to update and delete data.

These are just a few of the many features of VBScript. With its simple syntax and powerful capabilities, it is a great choice for creating a wide variety of programs.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
